property.name: storyOffset
property.shortdesc: The insertion point before the table in the story containing the table.

property.name: parentStory
property.shortdesc: The story that contains the text.

property.name: xmlContent
property.shortdesc: The text content or page item referred to by the element. Can return: Text, Story, PageItem, Movie, Sound, Graphic, Table or Cell.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the XMLElement.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the XMLElement &#40;a Document or XMLElement).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the XMLElement within its containing object.

property.name: pageItems
property.shortdesc: The page items collection, which can be used to process all page items in a container &#40;such as a document, page, or group), regardless of type.

property.name: images
property.shortdesc: A collection of bitmap images in any bitmap file format &#40;including TIFF, JPEG, or GIF).

property.name: graphics
property.shortdesc: A collection of imported graphics in any graphic file format &#40;vector, metafile, or bitmap).

property.name: textStyleRanges
property.shortdesc: A collection of text style ranges.

property.name: markupTag
property.shortdesc: The XML tag applied to the element. Can also accept: String.

property.name: contents
property.shortdesc: The contents of the text. Can return: String or SpecialCharacters enumerator.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the element to the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location in relation to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. . Can accept: XMLItem or Text. &#40;Optional)

method.name: duplicate
method.shortdesc: Duplicates the XMLElement.

method.name: markup
method.shortdesc: Associates the object with the specified XML element while preserving existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The object to mark up. Can accept: PageItem, Movie, Sound, Graphic, Story, Text or Table.

method.name: placeXML
method.shortdesc: Places XML content into the story, replacing the existing content.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The object to place into. Can accept: Story, PageItem, Graphic, Movie or Sound.

method.name: untag
method.shortdesc: Untags an element.

method.name: validate
method.shortdesc: Validates the element against a DTD.

parameter.name: maximumErrors
parameter.shortdesc: The maximum number of validation errors to generate. &#40;Optional)

method.name: applyParagraphStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified paragraph style to the text content of the XMLElement.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The paragraph style to apply. Can accept: String or ParagraphStyle.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears any attributes before applying the style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: applyCharacterStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies the specified character style to the text content of the XMLElement.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The character style to apply. Can accept: String or CharacterStyle.

method.name: convertToAttribute
method.shortdesc: Converts the XMLElement to an attribute of its parent element.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The name to give to the new attribute. &#40;Optional)

method.name: convertElementToTable
method.shortdesc: Converts the content of the XML element to a table.

parameter.name: rowTag
parameter.shortdesc: The XML tag that indicates a table row.

parameter.name: cellTag
parameter.shortdesc: The XML tag that indicates a table cell.

method.name: placeIntoInlineFrame
method.shortdesc: Places an XML element into an inline frame.

parameter.name: dimensions
parameter.shortdesc: The dimensions of the inline frame in the format [width, height].

method.name: placeIntoInlineCopy
method.shortdesc: Associates an existing page item with the XML element and places it into an inline frame.

parameter.name: copyItem
parameter.shortdesc: The page item to copy.

parameter.name: retainExistingFrame
parameter.shortdesc: If true, moves the existing page item. If false, moves a copy of the page item. &#40;Optional)

method.name: setContent
method.shortdesc: Replaces the content of XML element with content imported from a file.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The file path to the import file.

parameter.name: relativeBasePath
parameter.shortdesc: Base path used to resolve relative paths. &#40;Optional)

method.name: insertTextAsContent
method.shortdesc: Inserts the specified text as content before, in, or after the XML element.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The text to be inserted. Can accept: String or SpecialCharacters enumerator.

parameter.name: position
parameter.shortdesc: The position at which to insert the text. Note that text inserted before or after the element does not become part of the content of the element. Instead, it becomes content of the parent of the element.

method.name: applyTableStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies a table style to the table associated with the XMLElement.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The table style to apply. Can accept: String or TableStyle.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, removes local formatting before applying the table style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: applyCellStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies a cell style to the table cells associated with the XMLElement.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The cell style to apply. Can accept: String or CellStyle.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, removes local formatting before applying the cell style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: applyObjectStyle
method.shortdesc: Applies an object style to the frame associated with the XMLElement.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The object style to apply. Can accept: String or ObjectStyle.

parameter.name: clearingOverrides
parameter.shortdesc: If true, removes local formatting before applying the object style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: clearingOverridesThroughRootObjectStyle
parameter.shortdesc: If true, clears unchecked category attributes through the root style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: placeIntoFrame
method.shortdesc: Places the XML element into a new rectangular page item. If the XML element was already associated with a page item, that page item is deleted.

parameter.name: on
parameter.shortdesc: The page or spread on which to create the new page item. Can accept: Spread, Page or MasterSpread.

parameter.name: geometricBounds
parameter.shortdesc: The bounds of the page item excluding the stroke width, in the format [y1, x1, y2, x2].

method.name: placeIntoCopy
method.shortdesc: Associates the XML element with a copy of a page item.

parameter.name: on
parameter.shortdesc: The page or spread on which to create the new page item. Can accept: Spread, Page or MasterSpread.

parameter.name: placePoint
parameter.shortdesc: The page coordinates of the top left corner of the page item, in the format [y1, x1]

parameter.name: copyItem
parameter.shortdesc: The page item to copy.

parameter.name: retainExistingFrame
parameter.shortdesc: If true, associates the XML element with the existing page item and moves the page item &#40;rather than a copy of the page item). (Optional)

method.name: importXML
method.shortdesc: Imports the specified XML file into an InDesign document.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The XML file.

method.name: evaluateXPathExpression
method.shortdesc: Evaluates an XPath expression starting at this XML element in the structure.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The XPath expression.

parameter.name: prefixMappingTable
parameter.shortdesc: The namespace mapping table. Can accept: Array of Arrays of 2 Strings. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeText
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeGrep
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find what value and replaces the text with the change to value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: findTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: changeTransliterate
method.shortdesc: Finds text that matches the find character type value and replaces the text with the change character type value.

parameter.name: reverseOrder
parameter.shortdesc: If true, returns the results in reverse order. &#40;Optional)

method.name: exportFile
method.shortdesc: Exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The export style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: versionComments
parameter.shortdesc: The comment for this version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

method.name: asynchronousExportFile
method.shortdesc: asynchronously exports the object&#40;s) to a file.

parameter.name: format
parameter.shortdesc: The export format, specified as an enumeration value or as an extension that appears in the Save as type or Format menu in the Export dialog. Can accept: ExportFormat enumerator or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The path to the export file.

parameter.name: showingOptions
parameter.shortdesc: If true, displays the export options dialog. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The export style. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: versionComments
parameter.shortdesc: The comment for this version. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: forceSave
parameter.shortdesc: If true, forcibly saves a version. &#40;Optional)

method.name: store
method.shortdesc: Stores the object in the specified library.

parameter.name: using
parameter.shortdesc: The library in which to store the object.

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new XMLElement &#40;Optional)

method.name: remove
method.shortdesc: Deletes the XMLElement.

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Selects the object.

parameter.name: existingSelection
parameter.shortdesc: The selection status of the XMLElement in relation to previously selected objects. &#40;Optional)

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLElement.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

method.name: toSpecifier
method.shortdesc: Retrieves the object specifier.

method.name: addEventListener
method.shortdesc: Adds an event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)

method.name: removeEventListener
method.shortdesc: Removes the event listener.

parameter.name: eventType
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event type.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: captures
parameter.shortdesc: This parameter is obsolete. &#40;Optional)
